meanings.definition: A point or place of great height
meanings.sent1: The mountain peaks are the highs of the landscape.
meanings.sent2: She reached new highs in her climbing abilities.
meanings.sent3: The cat climbed to the highs of the tree and couldn't get down.
meanings.sent4: His spirits soared to the highs when he received the good news.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster reached dizzying highs before plummeting down.

meanings.definition: A state of euphoria or excitement
meanings.sent1: Winning the game brought her incredible highs of joy.
meanings.sent2: The concert was filled with energy and highs of emotion.
meanings.sent3: The highs of winning the lottery quickly faded when she realized it was a dream.
meanings.sent4: The highs of success can be addicting, driving people to achieve more.
meanings.sent5: The highs of laughter filled the room as they shared jokes and stories.

meanings.definition: The upper part of a garment or structure
meanings.sent1: She adjusted the highs of her dress to sit comfortably on her shoulders.
meanings.sent2: The architect focused on designing the highs of the building to be visually appealing.
meanings.sent3: The highs of the tent flapped in the wind, making a rhythmic sound.
meanings.sent4: The highs of the cathedral were adorned with intricate carvings.
meanings.sent5: The highs of the curtains brushed against the ceiling, adding elegance to the room.
